mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no scheduleNo, emp_no empNo, schedule_category scheduleCategory, schedule_title scheduleTitle, schedule_content scheduleContent, schedule_location scheduleLocation, schedule_start scheduleStart, schedule_end scheduleEnd, createdate, updatedate, create_id createId, update_id updateId FROM schedule WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND schedule_category = 's0103';
